modlist.Name: Shooty House
Author: SirPotatoes
nrgill28
modlist.Description:
Shoot house! Clear the rooms as fast as possible and go for a high score!
Installation: Download the zip file and place in your mods/ folder. Do not extract
Dependencies: Deli v0.2.5 or greater and WurstMod v2.0.2.0 or greater
Compare your scores against others' on this spreadsheet!
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uJ5WMFAxVDIHDB3rCt0gvPeVDmo5yK6BZwkjE0WcQew/edit?usp=sharing
NOTE: If the item spawner is missing, just reload the level from the wrist menu.

modlist.Name: Promeatheus
Author: NunSuperior
modlist.Description:
Promeatheus is a sci-fi themed Take and Hold map. It is an indoor map that features a mix of short and long hallways, small and medium sized holds/supply points, and shiny floors.

Performance:
I recommend turning off HDR and Bloom. I tuned the lighting to look good with HDR off. Also the map still looks good even on the Low setting.

Story(?):
Why is the Weinerland-Umami Corporation guarding this abandoned science vessel? Your mission is to investigate the Promeatheus and recover any valuable information you can.

modlist.Name: Wurst War 2
Author: ThatonePanMan
modlist.Description:
THIS MAP IS ABANDONED. I'm sorry, but this map runs like shit and I cannot find an easy way to fix it. I'll probably end up recreating the map in a less performance intensive way.
A World War II themed TNH map, best experienced with music OFF and played with Grumbly GI Grayson.
Also includes a generic version for exploration and sandbox stuff.
May or may not also contain a lemon.
Low Poly assets made by Synty.
modlist.Arguments: unzipToDir??moveToFolder?Wurst War II Generic?CustomLevels/Generic/?Wurst War II Generic?moveToFolder?Wurst War II TNH?CustomLevels/TakeAndHold/?Wurst War II TNH
modlist.Delinfo: CustomLevels/Generic/Wurst War II Generic?CustomLevels/TakeAndHold/Wurst War II TNH

modlist.Name: Sanctuary
Author: MÃ¼cke
Synty Studios
modlist.Description:
A little town overrun with Outlaws.
- pretty challenging, makes "Cowboys" into "Cattlemen"
- you can move freely in Holds
- has no barriers but natural cover
- 8 Holds, 6 Supplypoints

modlist.Name: Fort Bratwurst
Author: Andrew_FTW
modlist.Description: For my first Unity project, Ive built Fort Bratwurst, inspired by the drawing from u/GaPSMAV, with a few fun additions by me.

modlist.Name: TnH Supermarket - Day
Author: optomarcel
modlist.Description:
My very first map, set in a supermarket in broad daylight.

Comes in 2 versions, funky and normal. Funky contains some royalty free music by Kevin MacLeod https://www.youtube.com/user/kmmusic

Features 10 supply and 6 hold points.

Let me know if you have any issues/ideas.

Thanks and have fun playing

modlist.Name: TnH Supermarket - Night
Author: optomarcel
modlist.Description:
The night version of my supermarket. There are 2 versions of the map, funky and normal.
Funky contains royalty free music by Kevin MacLeod https://www.youtube.com/user/kmmusic
Contains 9 supply and 6 hold points.

modlist.Name: Customs
Author: NickMillion
modlist.Description:
0.3.8 is basically untested, let me know what's broken by pinging me on the H3VR modding discord.
I was recommended to also upload the map here, so here it is!
A slice of Customs from New Gas to Boilers coming out to roughly 300 square meters in size with 16 holds and 16 supply points!
The Random Order version of the map may have a bit of running, so I'd recommend using a character that has either increased patrols or increased supply points.

modlist.Name: Island Compound
Author: Devyndamonster
modlist.Description:
Fight hotdogs on an island compound!
- 16 Hold points
- 19 Supply points

This is a custom map for Take & Hold by Devyndamonster, the layout encourages a lot of more outdoors, longer range engagements, though there are still plenty of areas for close-quarters combat which is where most holds occur.

modlist.Name: Greenscreen Map
Author: TylerS76
modlist.Description:
Greenscreen map for item posing and thumbnails.
Requires WurstMod.
Message me on discord for questions and concerns: TylerS76#2974.

modlist.Name: Freehold
Author: Tug
Tiktok famous
modlist.Description:
Don't look down...
Original map created by Tug, (https://steamcommunity.com/id/tuggleboat) adapted to H3VR by tiktokfamous.
A Take and Hold map set atop a high-rise, features 4 hold points and 6 supply points.

modlist.Name: Tantive IV
Author: TorBomb
modlist.Description: The TANTIVE IV map from the OG SWBF2. Its not a pretty map, but its funto play. I don't know much about unity, so if anyone wants to help mewith this, just message me through the H3VR homebrew discord.

modlist.Name: Interconnect
Author: jesus~christ0
modlist.Description:
WIP this my first map everything is subject to change 
 8 supply 5 holds 
 takes place in some desert compound

modlist.Name: Roblox Headquarters
Author: starkris51
modlist.Description: This is the classic 2006 roblox mapThis map is generic and there isn't much to do in it. This is my first time making a mapIf you have wurstmod installed put it on Custom maps>Generic
